"You Ainâ€™t Thinking (About Me)" is a song by American soul group Sonia Dada. It was released on January 30, 1993, as the group's second single from their debut studio album and peaked at number three on the Australian ARIA Singles Chart, number 19 on the New Zealand RIANZ Singles Chart, and number 68 on the Canadian RPM 100 Hit Tracks chart. It was certified gold in Australia for shipments exceeding 35,000 copies.
